turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm going to be meeting with my mom and sister for my mom's birthday, so I was wondering if you'd be able to put in an order at Donatos for us?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, that shouldn't be a problem, I'm free to put in your order now, about what time do you want this pizza ready?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get it as soon as possible actually? I'll be headed there now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah that will work. I'll go ahead and pull up thier website. What size of pizza will you be getting tonight?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a large thin crust pizza? I saw earlier on their website they have any two topping large pizza for $12.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah I'll just go ahead and put in a "create your own" order unless you were interested in a specialty.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah, I'd like to create my own. Could I get the first topping as pepperoni? on both halves.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yep, got that marked for you. What would you like as your second topping?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get olives as well, black olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, got that put in there for you, were you guys needing anything else from Donatos or just the large 2 topping pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh wait, my sister was actually wondering if instead of olives on all of the pizza if we could do olives on one half and do grilled chicken on the other is that possible?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, definitely.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay good. Does that still qualify for the coupon?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yep, as long as you have two toppings on either side, it will count.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's good to know. Can you repeat the order just to be sure it's right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. I've got one large thin crust pizza with pepperoni on all of it, black olives on one half, and the other half with grilled chicken. Was there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just the large pizza is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, you've got your card information already in here it looks like, so I went ahead and booked the pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! How soon can I expect it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It says the waiting time will be around 25 minutes. I'll send the confirmation receipt to your email.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic, I'm happy you're able to help me out here.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem at all, Ms. I'll be dropping it off in about a half hour.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks again, Bye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: See you soon.
